title: Elven Rope (9R13)
text:
Set:	Reflections
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Possession
Game Text:	To play, spot an Elf. Bearer must be an Elf or Hobbit. Maneuver: Discard this possession to make a Shadow player return a minion with strength 6 or less to its owner's hand.
Rarity:	R
